CustomField.description: This is displayed in the customer portal as a way of showing the status of a customer's subscription using a combination of Current Allocation Schedule Status, Next Allocation Schedule Status, and Date Removed
CustomField.formula:
IF( ISBLANK(Date_Removed_from_Project__c)=false, "Inactive",
IF(
ISPICKVAL(Next_Schedule_Z_Status__c,"Active Subscription") && Current_Schedule_Z_Status__c="Not Yet Enacted", "Coming Soon",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Next_Schedule_Z_Status__c,"Active Subscription") && Current_Schedule_Z_Status__c="Enacted", "Active",
IF( ISPICKVAL(Next_Schedule_Z_Status__c,"Inactive Subscription") && Current_Schedule_Z_Status__c="Enacted", "Pending Removal","")
) ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is displayed in the customer portal as a way of showing the status of a customer's subscription using a combination of Current Allocation Schedule Status, Next Allocation Schedule Status, and Date Removed
CustomField.label: Status
